name: fibery-create-entity
description: Creates a new entity. [See the docs here](https://api.fibery.io/graphql.html#create)

name: fibery-create-multiple-entities
description: Creates entities in batch. [See the docs here](https://api.fibery.io/graphql.html#create)

attributesList.description: A list of entity attributes to create. Must be JSON-serializable, e.g. `[ { "Development/name": "pipedream" }, { "Development/name": "fibery" } ]`

name: fibery-list-fields-for-entity-type
description: Lists fields for an entity type. [See the docs here](https://api.fibery.io/graphql.html#list-of-entities)

name: fibery-list-types
description: Lists types in account. [See the docs here](https://api.fibery.io/#get-schema)
